snippet: A leading Nazi hunter has asked Denmark to investigate a 90-year-old Dane suspected of being involved in the mass murder of Jews in Belarus.
abstract: Nazi hunter Efraim Zuroff of Simon Wiesenthal Center files request with Copenhagen police to investigate Helmuth Leif Rasmussen after Justice Ministry rejects similar request; maintains recently published historic documents make strong case against 90-year-old Rasmussen, who admits being guard at Belarus camp, but denies killings.
lead_paragraph: A leading Nazi hunter has asked Denmark to investigate a 90-year-old Dane suspected of being involved in the mass murder of Jews in Belarus.

headline.main: Denmark: Nazi Hunter Urges Inquiry of Dane, 90
headline.print_headline: Europe; Denmark: Nazi Hunter Urges Inquiry of Dane, 90
